title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 14
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 14
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Hawaiian Holdings (HA). Hawaiian Holdings Inc.'s shares are headed for their biggest loss in more than a year after Stifel lowered its rating to sell from hold. The owner of Hawaiian Airlines faces more competition from United Airlines, which said yesterday that it will increase seating capacity to Hawaii by 20 percent next year. The move is a "fairly significant headwind," Stifel analyst Joe DeNardi wrote in a note to clients about his call. \u0010Dave also discusses his Chart of the Day "Index-fund perils are worth considering, Bernstein says." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
